prompt: Create a modern contact support page with a clean, minimalist design. The page should have a white background with a centered layout. At the top, display a large 'Contact Support' title in dark blue (Colors.blue[800]). Below the title, add a supportive subtitle 'We're here to help you' in grey text. Include three main sections: 1) A contact form with rounded input fields for Name (with person icon), Email (with email icon), and Message (multiline text area with message icon). Each field should have light grey backgrounds and subtle borders. 2) Contact information cards arranged horizontally showing Phone number with a phone icon, Email address with an email icon, and Live Chat with a chat icon. Each card should have a light blue background with rounded corners. 3) A prominent 'Send Message' button at the bottom with blue background and white text. Add appropriate padding and spacing throughout for a professional appearance.
